sentences.finnish: Katariina: Hei Julia, mihin sinä menet?
sentences.english: Katariina: Hi Julia, where are you going?

sentences.finnish: Julia: Ai hei Katariina, menen ensin tuohon pankkiin ja sitten uimahalliin.
sentences.english: Julia: Oh hi Katariina, I'm going first to that bank and then to the swimming pool.
Katariina: Do you go to the swimming pool every day?

sentences.finnish: Julia: En, vain maanantaisin ja torstaisin. Mihin sinä menet?
sentences.english: Julia: No, only on Mondays and Thursdays. Where are you going?

sentences.finnish: Katariina: Minä menen nyt kotiin. Käyn siellä kuumassa suihkussa, koska minulla on tosi kylmä.
sentences.english: Katariina: I'm going home now. I'll take a hot shower there because I'm really cold.
Then I'll go to the city center with Kaisa.

sentences.finnish: Julia: Ai jaa. Mitä te teette keskustassa?
sentences.english: Julia: Oh I see. What are you doing in the city center?

sentences.finnish: Katariina: Käymme ainakin tavaratalossa ja kahvilassa.
sentences.english: Katariina: We're visiting at least the department store and to the cafe.
We'll also definitely go to a restaurant in the evening.
